title: Ticket #5683: GRIDMANAGER_SELECTION_EXPR messes up grid ads
description: When GRIDMANAGER_SELECTION_EXPR is used to divide jobs among multiple gridmanager processes, the gridmanagers overwrite each other's grid ads in the collector. This is because the selection expression isn't included in the grid ads, so that ads from different gridmanagers can be disambiguated.
